detailsOfAchievement: KALAM EDUCATIONAL SOCIETY, Agra U.P. has nominated Dist.-Level socio- development activist as Dist. Coordinator in each district to study for need base, study & assessment of local development needs. Including backward, forward linkage & local natural heritage conservation to work with innovative development plan as demand of the State & Central Govt. programs time to time. Organization is working with Govt. aided project in Youth training, Skills Development, Vocational Training, Design & Technical Development Workshop for handicraft Cluster program Brass Metal Craft, Educational, Agra Munucipal Reform Project, Urdu Study Centre, Child Labour School, Health awareness, Mahila Rojgar Parak Training Balbari Kendra, Joint Forest Management, Base line Survey & Formation of SHGâ€™s, Workshop and Seminar etc organized different district of Uttar Pradesh. Major Activities & Achievements *The Society has runned BalBadi Kendra for the purpose of Pre-primary education for slums area children Under National Slums Development Project funded by DUDA Agra & Aligarh.500 children uplift primary education. Also a Survey under SJSRY Scheme. Project for formation of RCV/NHG/CDS & one day Training of 1000 RCV/NHG/CDS was also organized by society. *Joint Forest Management Programme Under Vishav Vaniki Pariyozana Funded by World Bank. The objective of the programme was formation of Village forest commitiee for the purpose of public partnership in forestation 10 village in Agra and 10 village Badun Forest Division. *Agra Municipal Reform Project as pilot project Funded by JBIC (Japan Bank of Corporation ) in five identified slums of Agra Municipal Area. detailsOfAchievement: Kalptaru Gram Sewa Samiti is a leading voluntary organization registered under the Indian Societies Registration Act 1860 The organization has its headquarters at Basti UP and activities spread in districts of not only Lucknow but also in Barabanki Faizabad Mirzapur Sonbhadra Varanasi Shrawasti Balrampur Morabadbad Sitapur Chandauli Shahjahanpur Kanpur Barely Lakhimpur Kheri Badhohi Rampur Basti Gonda Pelibhit Azamgadh Jaunpur Siddhartha Nagar Raibareli Kushi Nagar districts in the State of Uttar Pradesh India VISION Kalptaru Gram Sewa Samiti envisions empowering resource poor community to organize themselves in a collaborative spirit develop manage and run welfare activities schemes MISSION The Work for sustainable holistic development by empowering rural community particularly women artisans community by providing them quality education health care family welfare vocational training and creating awareness round development of the deprived section of the society Activities Carried Out By The Organization Under the rural development programme of the society the farmers of two village of Block of District were informed about the methods of scientific agriculture On this occasion improved seeds were distributed free of cost among the villagers Apart from this they were demonstrated the methods of preparing vermicompost Keeping on the mind the objectives of removal of poverty by reducing the problem of employment the society has been instrumental in taking various concrete steps in the direction of removal of poverty Society has started a Vocational Training Programme Considering very high level of illiteracy the society has started with the help of volunteers organizing education programmes on regular basis.Considering the huge success in organizing these programmes the society has continuously been distributing necessary books free of cost to the participants of this programme The Society has been conducting camps aimed at raising awareness about the bad effects of the alcoholism and drinking The volunteers of the society went into the villagers to raise consciousness about the effects of smoking and drinking and use of tobacco Despite of passing of so many years after independence Scheduled Caste Scheduled Tribes and Minorities have yet been associated in the main stream of the Society They still need a lot of support a not only from the Government but also from the society and NGOs Understanding its responsibility the Society has organized a number of programmes The Society has organized a programme on women right at District In this programme was attended by a member of women participants Consumer awareness camps were organized to make public aware of the rights available under the consumer protection Act 1956 The Programmes A programme on Women & Child Labour was organized by the Society on Labour Day In this programme the volunteers aware the public about women and child labour and told them about labour act to the participants The society organized a camp at district on World Environment Day to discuss the impact of growing pollution on the human health and environment The eminent speakers discussed the factors lending to increase in all types of pollutions including water air and sound pollution

detailsOfAchievement: We are a reputed name in the computer education We are running NIELIT computer courses Like CCC, BCC, successfully Also we are registered under society act 21, 1860 last 8 years. Currently we have 125 numbers of students in different courses like Basic computer course, computer account, Desktop publishing, Diploma in computer teacher training We are running the Hindi /English typewriter training course along with shorthand training and from last two years we are teaching URDU language to the student on free of cost through our experienced Urdu teacher Also we have authorized registered study center with National Early childhood care & education to conduct open/correspondence teachers training courses Like Nursery teacher training, primary teacher training computer training We are properly giving the education to handicapped/poor student on free of cost basis and support for getting the scholarship to poor & needed students On compilation of course from our institute we help to student for getting the job & employment We manage complete institute with our experienced & qualified team There are total 7 teachers just two for computer education, two for URDU Language, one for NECCE (Nursery/ Primary teachers training course), and two teachers for CCC & BCC computer courses We have separate toilet to girls student & boys student We have fresh drinking water arrangement on our institute The facility for our institute is our first priority like nonstop electricity supply, Fan, lighting, Black & white board in every classrooms.
